CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Include Image Folders
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If you have folders full of images, each folder can be synced into the library as a comic.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Parent folder name as series name
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable the ability to determine the series based on file path and file name. (Need to clear series name and resync when changing this setting.)

sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:title: Cover Thumb Cache Height
sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:summary: Set the height the cache image will be saved. Improve thumb quality on hi-res screens (Limit 200-500)

sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:title: Cover Thumb Cache Quality
sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:summary: Jpeg compression level, the lower it is will save space but lower quality of the image. Good for space limited devices. (Limit 1-100)

ListPreference.android:title: Library Filter
ListPreference.android:summary: Set the default of how the library should be filtered on launch.

ListPreference.android:title: Library Background
ListPreference.android:summary: How do you want the background of the library to be.

sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:title: Column Count
sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:summary: How many covers show display across the screen (Limit 1-6)

sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:title: Library Padding
sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:summary: How much padding around the screen to use (Limit 0-100)

sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:title: Cover Padding
sage.pref.NumPickerPref.android:summary: How much padding space around comics (Limit 0-100)

ListPreference.android:title: Screen Orientation
ListPreference.android:summary: Set the orientation of the image on the screen.

ListPreference.android:title: Scale Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Set how the image should scale depending on the screen.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Page Number
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When switching pages, a toast alert appears in the corner telling you what page you're on.
Display comics at full screen. Tap and hold for options to exit when there is no virtual buttons.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Fling Navigation
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use the left/Right fling gesture to move to next or previous page.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Preload Next Page
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This feature speeds up page loading, but if there is out of memory issues then disable this feature.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep Screen On
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Prevent screen from timing out while viewing a comic.

Preference.android:title: Clear Library
Preference.android:summary: This will delete the entire database and cover cache.

Preference.android:title: Clear Series
Preference.android:summary: This will reset all the series name in the database to unknown. If you click sync, series name will be updated.

Preference.android:title: Clear Cover Cache
Preference.android:summary: This will delete all the covers generated for each comic. If you click sync, covers will be recreated.
